text:
- Ricoh provide wide
spectrum of digital services.

We have presence in more
than 3,000 hospitals.
and 70% of the largest health systems.

Healthcare industry spent
between 13 to $16 billion a year

for processing the revenue
cycle management-related stuff
in manual work.
What we believe is that by working
with AWS toward automating those things,

those legacy technology
and outdated workflow,

we can improve the
overall industry's margin.
And that's one of the reason we picked AWS

and specifically, the Enterprise
Transformation Program.
The biggest thing we have achieved

as a part of Enterprise
Transformation journey

and as a first step is that we
modernized our infrastructure
to handle unstructured data.

Because of that, we removed
all the technical debt we had,
and we have much more efficient process,
as well as now we can scale

what we believe is the
solution we put in place.

Now we are capturing data from
about 80% of the documents.

Our average time to index
move from three minutes
to 30 seconds.

The accuracy rate of our
model is shooting up to 97%
because it's a big operational difference

and what we believe it that
with the deep expertise
and customer-focused culture
and the customer base AWS has

can drive and provide
us the success we need.
(lively music)
